attributes.action: Have a vote of no confidence in the Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details: I personally have no confidence in the Prime Minister’s ability to run the government and ultimately the UK as a whole. A petition would reflect the voting populations opinion of this.
attributes.background: Simply have a vote of no confidence in the Prime Minister, as the would reflect the opinion of the voting population.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or MPs to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.
